sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import classNames from "../utils/class-names"; import useInterval from "../utils/useInterval"; import {minutesToDuration} from '../utils/duration'; import {secondsToDuration} from '../utils/duration'; function Pomodoro() { // Timer starts out paused const [isTimerRunning, setIsTimerRunning] = useState(false); const [focusTime, setFocusTime] = useState(25); const [breakTime, setBreakTime] = useState(5); useInterval( () => { // ToDo: Implement what should happen when the timer is running }, isTimerRunning ? setInterval(focusTime-1) : null ); function playPause() { setIsTimerRunning((prevState) => !prevState); } return (
Focus Duration: { minutesToDuration(focusTime) }
Break Duration: {minutesToDuration(breakTime)}
{/* TODO: Implement stopping the current focus or break session and disable when there is no active session */}
{/* TODO: This area should show only when a focus or break session is running or pauses */}
{/* TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) and total duration */}

{isTimerRunning ? `Focusing for ${minutesToDuration(focusTime)}` : `On break for ${minutesToDuration(breakTime)} minutes`}

{/* TODO: Update message below to include time remaining in the current session */}

25:00 remaining

); } export default Pomodoro;
